pkgmetadata.longdescription: Many Ways to Make, Modify, Mark, and Map Myriad Networks // A set of tools for making, modifying, marking, and mapping many different types of networks. All functions operate with matrices, edge lists, and 'igraph', 'network', and 'tidygraph' objects, and on one-mode, two-mode (bipartite), and sometimes three-mode networks. The package includes functions for importing and exporting, creating and generating networks, modifying networks and node and tie attributes, and describing and visualizing networks with sensible defaults.
